titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: s2: Brave New World: <*> (this line has been erased, apparently from an earlier use of the card...) Common Reader: <*> Flowering Wilderness: <*>, Watson, Bidot <*> <*> Lawrence Letters: 3. Todd 4 <*>, 1. Page, 2. Fisher Hardy, Raphael <*>

body.ab:
1933 SATENSTEIN to 20 April Miss Sylvia 3 rue Bonaparte VI
20 Jan. 3m 1v. dep. 30 30 - Time + Western Man 24 24 Alexanderplatz 26 - 26 Pierre the Ambiguous 28 Of Human Bondage 28 Jan extra dep. 30f vol. 1 Lincoln Steffens 4 Feb 2 4 Feb. 9 Feb. Folk lore in Old test. card 27 Feb 19 July 2 card 13 March B.B. by J.oan M owes sub. 20 April - 20 July = 3 mos.
Books to be Kept Arnold BII - Adams: Raphael Brave New World: <*>
Blair Mischief: Gentrar
